channel.title: Weirdest thing you've done drunk or high?
channel.description: I was drunk, and walked into Wal-Mart with my pants down. I saw pedobear also. :|

item.source: Weirdest thing you've done drunk or high?

item.title: Weirdest thing you've done drunk or high?
item.dc:creator: @IdidntInhale IdidntInhale
item.description:
@IdidntInhale wrote:

#1. I always seem to sing when im high, almost every single time i fucking end up singing and annoying the shit out of my friends xD

#2. Once, when i huffed gasoline, i geuss i picked up a chicken and asked my friend if i could keep it as a pet, and i pet it and everything, i only vaguely remember this though.

#3. After smoking a fairly decent amount of pretty good pot, while walking back to my house there was a faily decent sized puddle (3 feet wide by 10-15 feet long) and when i walked up to it, i exclaimed to my two friends who were also high “oh my god! it’s a river!” then stood there for a good minute thinking of the best way to traverse this obstacle

And the list goes on

Read full topic
item.source: Weirdest thing you've done drunk or high?

item.title: Weirdest thing you've done drunk or high?
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:23, topic:252868”][quote author=Zoss link=topic=334031.msg2603309#msg2603309 date=1230392232]

Threw up 9 times the other night. Bong then 50 shots of pure vodka, then mixed with some other random alcohols we all found.

Was horrible.
Nobody can remember what happened that night, but I imagine that was the weirdest and most hectic of experiences.

You know a party was good when you can’t remember anything.

You realize after 50 shots of vodka that you’d be long dead, right?

Haha, yes, aware, minor exageration.
It was more like 15.

Either way, 450mL of it.

Jesus christ. How are you still alive…alcohol poisoning much?
[/quote]

To be honest it’s not THAT much. I’ve had lots more and I probably drink that much everytime I go out. If you go to parties everyone drinks that much. I’d even say usually more. Most people drink a 768 ml bottle here. Though I do live in an anomoly town known for alcoholics and druggies.[/quote]

Whenever I get past the 500mL vodka mark I don’t remember anything (literally), and others have to remind me of the entire night. Oh well.

Read full topic
item.source: Weirdest thing you've done drunk or high?

item.title: Weirdest thing you've done drunk or high?
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

Wierdest thing I’ve done drunk is sleep beside the toilet because I had been throwing up for hours. Don’t get drunk, plant a tree. Drinking kills

Read full topic

item.title: Weirdest thing you've done drunk or high?
item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

Played chicken in front of passing trains when I was drunk.
Walked over to a parked car with old lady inside and pissed over the car (Don’t remind me about it) but that was when I was stoned and drunk.

Read full topic
item.source: Weirdest thing you've done drunk or high?

item.title: Weirdest thing you've done drunk or high?
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

One of my friends made some pot cookies (he claimed there was about an 8th in each one, I don’t personally believe it), I ate a couple. Cookies take a while, so I decided I would go smoke a little. A couple joints later I was feeling good, so I went back inside the movie theater (staff screening of Pineapple Express) and enjoy the movie. After a fucking hilarious movie, my friends wanted to go party, we drove to one of their houses. Along the way the cookies kicked in. I really started tripping balls. Apparently I was hanging out the window yelling at people. When we stopped to get Tim Horton’s, they lost me. I ran off because something was whispering to me in the back seat of the car and I didn’t like that. I ended up being found laughing. I laughed at something, then I was laughing at the fact that I couldn’t stop laughing. Not the weirdest, just a really fun night.

Read full topic
item.source: Weirdest thing you've done drunk or high?

item.source: Weirdest thing you've done drunk or high?

item.title: Weirdest thing you've done drunk or high?
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

thefalloffuckingtroy.:

A couple months, i stayed over night at my friends house, Him, his brother and me were drunk (i was drunk on my first can, it was my first time) and then we did a dime, and i was so drunk i couldn’t even figure out if i was high or if i was even smoking it yet, but after my 4/5th hit i stopped lol… but after that we made some toaster waffles and started stacking cheez-its on his brother who was passed out on the couch. That night was the best night of my life, but i haven’t done anything like that since, but yeah the wierdest thing that happened that night if i remember correctly was that we saw an ant and we fucking went crazy trying to kill it with whatever we could find.

kill it with fire?

Read full topic
item.source: Weirdest thing you've done drunk or high?

item.title: Weirdest thing you've done drunk or high?
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

[quote=“Kane., post:24, topic:252868”][quote author=jme link=topic=334031.msg2603584#msg2603584 date=1230404292]

Threw up 9 times the other night. Bong then 50 shots of pure vodka, then mixed with some other random alcohols we all found.

Was horrible.
Nobody can remember what happened that night, but I imagine that was the weirdest and most hectic of experiences.

You know a party was good when you can’t remember anything.

You realize after 50 shots of vodka that you’d be long dead, right?

Haha, yes, aware, minor exageration.
It was more like 15.

Either way, 450mL of it.

Jesus christ. How are you still alive…alcohol poisoning much?

To be honest it’s not THAT much. I’ve had lots more and I probably drink that much everytime I go out. If you go to parties everyone drinks that much. I’d even say usually more. Most people drink a 768 ml bottle here. Though I do live in an anomoly town known for alcoholics and druggies.
[/quote]
It’s not too much- Enough to get me quite drunk. But, it’s not all I drank that night.
Had some alcohol with gold shit in it, then a bottle of smirnoff.

Good night.
New Years should be better.[/quote]

goldschlager

Once when i stayed with my cousin for a week. We went to our grandmas house while she was in florida and called his mom to tell her were watching a movie and crashing there. We decided we should try wine. So we both dropped a bottle in about 5 minutes and NOTHING HAPPENED. 20 minutes later neither of us could walk and we called some friends over. I most likely did some fucked up shit that night.

Read full topic

Yz85Racer:

and I woke up in the park next to it, with a beer tipped down my pants. Was embarrassing to explain next morning.

Keep telling that to yourself and it’ll be fine.

item.source: Weirdest thing you've done drunk or high?

item.title: Weirdest thing you've done drunk or high?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Last time i was high i walked into the gas station and bought 3 packs of donuts. I paid for it and everything, but the thing was, when i left, i left with nothing. My wallet was still on the counter along with the donuts.

Last time i drank was probably the worst. Apparently I slept with my eyes open and The next day my hangover was so bad i couldn’t open my eyes or talk straight. Luckily my buddy i was with told the parents i… drank to much coffee? I really don’t know how that worked, but it did so whatever.

Read full topic

item.title: Weirdest thing you've done drunk or high?
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:13, topic:252868”]I personally believe I have something which tops everyone’s story.

It involves 8 grams of potent mushrooms, me being unexperienced, and some pot. I think if I go into detail it will be a waste of time, no one would believe me. So long story short: I broke into some houses, with the people still inside. All this time I thought I was literally dead and had no control over my actions. It was a horrible experience and it took me a long time to even feel comfortable thinking about it, or even doing shrooms again.

There is so much more to the story but I cant be fucked. It’d be a long post.[/quote]

do it.

Read full topic
